name: Tint Scale
description: Creates a sequential scale of tints from a base color. Varies lightness while preserving hue and adjusting chroma proportionally. Perfect for sequential/quantitative data visualization.

count.description: Number of tints to generate. Default is 9

light_start.description: Lightness of lightest tint (0-1). Default is 0.95

light_end.description: Lightness of darkest tint (0-1). Default is 0.25
